children.text:
Version 1.2.0

• Android 7.1 shortcuts: Search and first subscriptions
• Flair your own posts
• Read wiki pages
• New view: Simple cards
• Albums redesign
• Show comment being replied in advanced editor
• Option to show upvote percentage in comments
• Show unread messages in drawer menu
• Go to random subreddit
• Mixtape.moe videos support
• Swipe to close gifs and albums
• Change direction of swipe to close
• Share gif/video files directly
• Download/share in Swipe view
• Support for new reddit spoilers
• Option to check messages every 5 min
• Option to hide images from self posts
• Share subreddit from sidebar
• Subreddit icon in sidebar
• Open sidebar from comments
• New flairs style
• Filters sorted alphabetically
• i.redditmedia.com support
• Error placeholder for images that fail to load
• Fixed deep linking to user profiles
• Separate search items in menu
• Swipe back min threshold to 5%
• Delete all drafts option
• Disabled swipe to refresh in internal browser
• Open media from external sources
• User interface improvements
• Many bug fixes and improvements!

Version 1.1.0

• Set day/night themes and switch between them
• Save theme presets with your favorite combinations
• Set download folders per file type (Settings-Media)
• Download full albums or selected images from thumbnails screen
• Save drafts when composing comments, messages or text posts in advanced editor
• Subreddit filters apply only to frontpage and r/all
• Option to mark posts as read on scroll (Settings-Posts)
• Suggest title when submitting links
• Readability mode for links in Swipe view
• Beautiful vote, save and score animations
• Mark your posts as nsfw
• Increased comment buttons area
• Gif controls visibility is remembered
• Share link or file in image viewer
• Long press Go to or toolbar to go to a subreddit
• Long press Search to search posts
• Night mode toggle in lateral menu
• Option to show nsfw toggle in lateral menu
• Option to show independent Go to options in lateral menu (Settings-Menu)
• Highlight friends in posts list
• Added grey accent colors
• Open comments settings from comments screen
• Option to disable comment animations
• Unlimited subreddit length in widget
• Fixed sharing images from reddituploads
• Fixed downloads stopping on close
• Give Boost some love in Settings-About

Version 1.0.25

• Fixed multireddits not loading
• Fixed zoom not working on albums
• Fixed previews not loading in user profiles
• Post info updated when refreshing comments
• Added animation when comment is fully collapsed
• Fixed crash rendering some special characters in Android 6.0

Version 1.0.24

• Fixed bug that may prevent some subs to load

Version 1.0.23

• Android 7.0 Nougat
• Updated third party libraries
• Many bug fixes

Version 1.0.22

• Swipe from the right in subreddits to open its sidebar
• Swipe from the right in multireddits to see its subreddits
• Swipe from the right in frontpage/all to discover trending subreddits
• Preview formatting of comments, posts and messages before submitting
• Select and copy parts of comments, posts and messages
• Show messages and its replies as threads in messages tab

Version 1.0.21

• Upload images in comments, messages and text posts using advanced editor
• New theme: Night blue
• vid.me videos support
• Fixed Gfycat errors in some android versions
• Option to load images based on current network (Settings-General-Network usage)
• Message mods button in sidebar
• Removed redundant send floating button (Optional in Settings-General-Composing)
• Support for more spoilers tags

Version 1.0.20

• Sort options in user profiles
• More theme options: Customize toolbar style and color of post titles, read posts and sticky posts
• Fixed memory leak that might cause performance issues/crashes after intensive use
• Fixed crash in internal web browser

Version 1.0.19

• HD images in albums
• Added Suggested comment sort
• Added Q&A comment sort
• Theme applied to menu backgrounds
• New icon design
• Fixed error loading more comments in long threads
• Increased clickable area of buttons in Cards and Compact views
• Fixed inserted link not replacing selected text in advanced editor
• Fixed floating button hide animation
• Fixed some random crashes

Version 1.0.18

• Previews and thumbnails for text posts
• Filters applied to Widget
• Fixed full height previews in split screen
• More bug fixes

Version 1.0.17

• New Widget: Resizable with options to customize colors
• Remember last used view per subscription
• New List view with more compact information
• New Image view, perfect for image subreddits
• Ask to download GIF or MP4
• Support for Multi window in LG Devices
• Show subreddit in gallery view
• Option to always show buttons in minicards and list views
• Option to hide comments button in posts
• Option to show share button in posts
• Option to disable split screen mode in tablets
• Tap/Long tap to hide toolbar and info in albums
• Use primary theme color in menu header
• Fix: Full height previews in gallery view
• Fix: Remove horizontal gap in full width cards
• Fix: Text in self posts is not required
• Fixes in media download
• Support for vertical youtube videos
• Share option in Chrome Custom Tabs

Version 1.0.16

• Fixed gifs and hd images not loading sometimes
• Fixed share image in hd mode
• Sort search results
• Auto hide toolbar when navigating comments
• Image and gif viewer: Tap toolbar to hide

Version 1.0.15

• Cache for gifs and images to save bandwidth
• Show loading progress (percentage and size) for gifs and HD images
• Fixes in downloaded media notifications
• Improved drawer menu: Configure visible items, option to open from right edge
• Option to open HD images with deep zoom by default and fit to width option
• Option to disable loading of thumbnails and preview
• Optional mark as read button in posts
• Mark messages as read from notifications
• Swipe up gesture to close images
• Long press toolbar to go to a subreddit
• Fixed gif aspect ratio in landscape
• New notification icon
• Options to set cache max size and clear cache
• i.redd.it support
• Small ui improvements

Version 1.0.14

• Friends support
• Sync visited posts for Gold users
• Set domains to always open in external app (Settings-Links)
• Option to disable colored comments
• Added more intervals for checking new messages
• Sort subscriptions alphabetically
• Long press a subscription to move to top or bottom of the list
• Share and copy posts shortlink
• Tap the toolbar or long press up arrow in comments to go to top
• Bug fixes

Version 1.0.12

• Sort your subscriptions. The subscription at the top of the list will be the starting page
• Customize highlighted text color in themes
• Handle reddit links in app (i.e. bestof)
• Separate setting to dismiss images. If tap to close is enabled, long tap will hide the toolbar. Otherwise the toolbar will be hidden on single tap
• Fixed videos from m.youtube.com
• Added support for more spoiler tags

Version 1.0.11

• Customize theme colors! Open Theme option in menu to select primary and accent colors
• Renewed Gallery view with full titles and previews
• Mark as read button in messages
• Fixed blank Youtube videos in Slide show mode
• Many bug fixes and improvements

Version 1.0.10

• Added Spoiler  Hahaha!  support
• Added strikethrough text support
• Youtube timestamps support
• Option to fully collapse a comment
• Dagger † in controversial comments
• Back/Forward buttons in internal browser
• Discard changes confirmation on Submit exit
• Fixed more gifs loaded as images
• Fixed errors opening some links
• Formatting options for text posts
• Fixed problem with scroll and keyboard while composing
• Fixed errors on submit
• New icon
• Read again what's new in Settings-About-Changelog
• Minor bug fixes

Version 1.0.9

• Samsung Multiwindow support
• Search subreddit results include subscribers, nsfw and type (private, restricted, gold…)
• Fixed gifs with wrong extension opening as static images
• Added image previews for links
• Better quality image previews for gfycat and albums
• Fixed images from reddituploads not loading
• Reduced comments loading time
• Improved table formatting
• Fixed tablet split-screen not working when viewing single subreddit
• Copy fields content between basic and advanced search
• Sync vote and save actions between comments screen and list of submissions
• Press enter to go to subreddit
• Added copy message, copy self post and share comment permalink
• Fixed Network errors when submitting posts or comments
• Fixed zoom not working in internal browser
• Fixed opening subreddits from external sources
• Minor bug fixes

Version 1.0.8

• Fixed gifs not looping in some devices
• Option to choose default gif-video quality: Best quality, Low size or Auto based on network settings

Version 1.0.7

• Comments highlight and navigation options: Threads, OP, IAmA, Mine, Distinguished, Links, Search text, Search author.
• Report posts and comments
• Option to load comments collapsed
• History of visited subreddits to use in autocomplete fields
• Option to show full title in minicards
• Distinguished tags (Admin, Mod, Special) in posts and comments
• Show parent comment in dialog
• Highlight logged in username in comments
• Open comments button in image, gif and album viewers
• Hide description when zooming images
• Fix: Multireddit sorting
• Fix: Opening a comment shows context
• Fix: Mark post as read when opening link

Version 1.0.6

• Select default browser: Chrome Custom Tabs, Internal Browser or open externally
• Colored link type indicators
• Subscriptions in drawer, options to show only casual and multireddits on top.
• Optional new navigation bar in comments
• Swap comment click/long click actions
• Configurable swipe back gesture sensitivity and distance threshold
• Thumbnails grid in albums
• Album image descriptions redesign
• Tap to dismiss albums
• Download images from albums
• Option to hide floating action buttons
• Option to color soft-navigation bar to match theme colors.
• Sync title and subreddit when switching submit tabs
• Fixed some blank images in full-height cards preview
• Fixed tablet split-screen comments navigation

Version 1.0.5

• Filter read posts
• Edit self posts
• New view: Mini cards, including full width option
• Option for full size previews in Cards (not cropped)
• Change fonts for title and comments, Roboto Light, Condensed, Slab
• Floating Button to filter read, scroll to top and submit
• Thumbnails on left option
• Autohide toolbar in comments
• Streamable previews and thumbnails
• Edit comments from profile
• Mark all messages as read
• Fixed copy comment link

Version 1.0.4

• Filter by subreddit, domain, author and title keywords
• Options to reduce data usage in mobile and/or wifi
• Fixed some galleries not loading
• Option to show post flairs
• Option to set advanced text editor as default
• Dialog to create links
• Search dialog filled with current search
• Fixed loading bar that stays shown
• Show hidden scores indicator

Version 1.0.3

• Mark posts as read
• Scroll comments with volume keys
• Animate comments scroll
• Show post author
• Show user flairs in comments
• Optional hide button in posts
• Button to go to parent comment
• Set default sort for comments and posts
• More compact: Reducing text size reduces spacing between elements
• Click outside Youtube videos to close
• Autocomplete in go to subreddit
• Loading indicator for images, gifs, HD images
• Share and download HD images
• Self posts text above voting buttons
• Changing screen orientation does not close compose dialog
• Show divider between cards in Amole
